title: SL Rupee appreciates after directive
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lankan Rupee appreciated by Rs. 365/- against the Dollar following a directive from the Central Bank on inter-bank rates
CBSL will announce the Middle rates of USD/LKR exchange rate for inte-rbank transactions based on the previous day’s rate in the Inter-bank market.
Wickremesinghe will enable SL to address its challenges: Canadian HC
